data.text: @NBCNewYork She's not "black", that's a generalizing negative color, not a demographic.  She's obviously predominately caucasian but that slave law defines her as African American.  Change that law and this acknowledgement would be moot. It should be about her skills. Think about that.
@NBCNewYork Victoria Mahoney is "Star Wars" movies' first black female director   https://t.co/OqE5mKssyA
